text: Samuel Strain, Jr. (born December 9, 1939) is an American R&B; vocalist, known for his time as a member of Little Anthony and the Imperials (1958–1972; 1992–2005) and The O'Jays (1975–1992). ==Other websites== * * Category:1939 births Category:Living people Category:African-American singers Category:American soul singers Category:American tenors Category:Musicians from Brooklyn
title: Sammy Strain
